Property Documentation

- (NSString *) adjustmentType [read, write, retain]

Specifies whether the ScalingAdjustment is an absolute number or a percentage of the current capacity.

Valid values are ChangeInCapacity, ExactCapacity, and PercentChangeInCapacity.

Constraints:
Length: 1 - 255
Pattern: [---
]*

- (NSString *) autoScalingGroupName [read, write, retain]

The name or ARN of the Auto Scaling Group.

Constraints:
Length: 1 - 1600
Pattern: [---
]*

- (NSString *) policyName [read, write, retain]

The name of the policy you want to create or update.

Constraints:
Length: 1 - 255
Pattern: [---
]*

- (NSNumber *) scalingAdjustment [read, write, retain]

The number of instances by which to scale.

AdjustmentType determines the interpretation of this number (e.g., as an absolute number or as a percentage of the existing Auto Scaling group size). A positive increment adds to the current capacity and a negative value removes from the current capacity.
